languages.text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... Если бы не вы!" {n}Кассия сжимает руки в кулаки, и вас обдает очередной волной гнева. Тело Леди-Навигатора сотрясается от переполняющей его силы — и она вот-вот вырвется вновь.{/n} "Если бы вы не втянули меня в свои интриги и авантюры, этого бы никогда не случилось!"

traits.locale_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... Если бы не вы!" {n}Кассия сжимает руки в кулаки, и вас обдает очередной волной гнева. Тело Леди-навигатора сотрясается от переполняющей его силы — и она вот-вот вырвется вновь.{/n} "Если бы вы не втянули меня в свои интриги и авантюры, этого бы никогда не случилось!"

languages.text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"
languages.original_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... Если бы не вы!" {n}Кассия сжимает руки в кулаки, и вас обдает очередной волной гнева. Тело Леди-Навигатора сотрясается от переполняющей его силы — и она вот-вот вырвется вновь.{/n} "Если бы вы не втянули меня в свои интриги и авантюры, этого бы никогда не случилось!"

Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power, and you can tell that it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigues and schemes, none of it would have happened!"

Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

languages.text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…何もかもあなたのせいです！」{n}カシアは拳を握りしめ、怒りの波がまた押し寄せる。彼女の身体は溢れんばかりのパワーに震えており、それがもう一度爆発しようとしているのがわかる。{/n}「あなたが陰謀や策略に私を巻き込まなければ、こんなことにはならなかったのに！」
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

traits.locale_text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…何もかもあなたのせいです！」{n}カシアは拳を握りしめ、怒りの波がまた押し寄せる。彼女の身体は溢れんばかりのパワーに震えており、それがもう一度爆発しようとしているのがわかる。{/n}「あなたが陰謀や策略に私を巻き込まなければ、こんなことにはならなかったのに！」

languages.text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，这……这一起都是因为你！”{n}卡西娅握紧了拳头，又一波愤怒的情感洪流席卷了你的意识。她的力量不断溢出，整个身体都在颤抖。你看得出来，她的力量很快就要再次爆发了。{/n}“如果你当初没把我卷入你那些阴谋诡计之中，这一切根本不会发生！”
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

traits.locale_text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，这……这一起都是因为你！”{n}卡西娅握紧了拳头，又一波愤怒的情感洪流席卷了你的意识。她的力量不断溢出，整个身体都在颤抖。你看得出来，她的力量很快就要再次爆发了。{/n}“如果你当初没把我卷入你那些阴谋诡计之中，这一切根本不会发生！”

languages.text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... ¡Y todo es culpa suya!». {n}Cassia aprieta los puños y te azota otra oleada de furia. Su cuerpo tiembla con la fuerza de su poder desbocado, a punto de estallar de nuevo.{/n} «¡De no haberme involucrado en sus intrigas y sus conspiraciones, nada de esto habría ocurrido!».
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... ¡Y todo es culpa suya!». {n}Cassia aprieta los puños y te azota otra oleada de furia. Su cuerpo tiembla con la fuerza de su poder desbocado, a punto de estallar de nuevo.{/n} «¡De no haberme involucrado en sus intrigas y sus conspiraciones, nada de esto habría ocurrido!».

languages.text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und das alles nur Euretwegen!" {n}Cassia ballt die Fäuste, und eine weitere Welle Wut spült über dich hinweg. Ihr Körper bebt von ihrer überbordenden Kraft, und du merkst, dass sie gleich wieder hervorschießen wird.{/n} "Hättet Ihr mich nicht in Eure Intrigen und Machenschaften hineingezogen, wäre das alles nicht passiert!"
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

traits.locale_text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und das alles nur Euretwegen!" {n}Cassia ballt die Fäuste, und eine weitere Welle Wut spült über dich hinweg. Ihr Körper bebt von ihrer überbordenden Kraft, und du merkst, dass sie gleich wieder hervorschießen wird.{/n} "Hättet Ihr mich nicht in Eure Intrigen und Machenschaften hineingezogen, wäre das alles nicht passiert!"

languages.text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... Tout ça à cause de vous ! » {n}Une nouvelle vague de fureur vous submerge alors que Cassia serre les poings, le corps toujours secoué par la puissance du pouvoir qui la submerge. Vous sentez qu'il est de nouveau sur le point d'exploser.{/n} « Si vous ne m'aviez pas impliquée dans vos petites machinations, rien de tout cela ne serait arrivé ! »
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

traits.locale_text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... Tout ça à cause de vous ! » {n}Une nouvelle vague de fureur vous submerge alors que Cassia serre les poings, le corps toujours secoué par la puissance du pouvoir qui la submerge. Vous sentez qu'il est de nouveau sur le point d'exploser.{/n} « Si vous ne m'aviez pas impliquée dans vos petites machinations, rien de tout cela ne serait arrivé ! »

languages.text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Hepsi de senin yüzünden!" {n}Cassia'nın yumruklarını sıkmasıyla yeniden bir öfke dalgasıyla sarsılıyorsun. Tüm vücudu, taşmak üzere olan gücü yüzünden titriyor. Yine zincirlerinden kurtulmak üzere olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n} "Beni entrikalarınla komplolarına alet etmeseydin bunların hiçbiri yaşanmazdı!"
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And it's all because of you!" {n}Cassia clenches her fists and another wave of anger washes over you. Her body is quaking from the force of her overflowing power and you can tell it is about to burst forth once more.{/n} "If you hadn't involved me in your intrigue and schemes, none of this would have happened!"

traits.locale_text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Hepsi de senin yüzünden!" {n}Cassia'nın yumruklarını sıkmasıyla yeniden bir öfke dalgasıyla sarsılıyorsun. Tüm vücudu, taşmak üzere olan gücü yüzünden titriyor. Bir kez daha zincirlerinden kurtulmak üzere olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n} "Beni entrikalarınla komplolarına alet etmeseydin, bunların hiçbiri yaşanmazdı!"
